00070 TranslationEngine * TranslationEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00071 {
00072         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == TranslationEngine::EngineName())
00073                 return (TranslationEngine *)engine;
00074         return NULL;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void TranslationEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00078   setLibFileOpt("annotation-file");
00079   setLibFileOpt("marker-list-file");
00080   setLibFileOpt("translate-file");
00081   setLibFileOpt("metabolizer-file");
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*****************************************************************************/
00085 /**
00086  * _defineOptions:
00087  * Synopsis:
00088  *
00089  * Helper function for the TranslationEngine::TranslationEngine constructor. 
00090  *
00091  *   Call TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions and then define
00092  * the translate engine specific engines. It is required to define them
00093  * out side of the common controller so that command line help does not
00094  * display help for these options.
00095  *
00096  * @param adtOpts - the ATDOption object to validate
00097  * @param engine  - required for complex validation only.
00098  *
00099  * @return - Throws APT_ERR_ABORT exception on error.
00100  */
00101 /*****************************************************************************/
00102 static void _defineOptions(unsigned char controllerMask, TranslationEngine *engine)
00103 {
00104 
00105 
00106   engine->setUsage("Allele translatione engine for the generation of allele translation reports.");
00107 
00108   TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions(engine);
00109 
00110   // WARNING: The m_controllerMask if conditions are deliberately separate and not
00111   // coded as "if/else" pairs in order to afford testing both
00112   // code paths simultaneously. DO NOT make these "if/else".
00113 
00114   engine->defOptMult("", "experiment-list-vector", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00115                        "=> Not a command line option.", "");
00116 
00117   engine->defOptMult("", "marker-list-vector", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00118                        "=> Not a command line option.", "");
00119 
00120   engine->defOptMult("", "sample-table", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00121                        "=> Not a command line option.", "0");
00122 
00123   engine->defineOptionSection("Internal Use Only");
00124   engine->defineOption("", "prototype-chp-files", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00125                          "=> For internal use only.", "false" );
00126   engine->defineOption("", "salt", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Salt to add to the MD5 values.", "salt");
00127   
00128   return;
00129 
00130 }
00131 // end _defineOptions
00132 /*****************************************************************************/
00133 /*****************************************************************************/
00134 /**
00135  * TranslationEngine::TranslationEngine:
00136  * Synopsis:
00137  *
00138  *   Default constructor that primarily defines the options to use.
00139  *
00140  */
00141 /*****************************************************************************/
00142 TranslationEngine::TranslationEngine(char *argv[],
00143                                      unsigned char controllerMask,
00144                                      void (*messageHandlerCallback)(ADTOptions & adtOpts))
00145     : m_controllerMask(controllerMask)
00146 {
00147 
00148   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_controllerMask & (C_CONSOLE | C_CMDLINE), "");
00149 
00150   _defineOptions(m_controllerMask, this);
00151 
00152   parseArgv(argv == NULL ? CONSOLE_ARGV : argv);
00153 
00154   m_messageHandlerCallback = messageHandlerCallback;
00155 
00156   return;
00157 
00158 }
00159 // end TranslationEngine::TranslationEngine()
00160 /*****************************************************************************/
00161 /*****************************************************************************/
00162 /**
00163  * _validateOptions:
00164  * Synopsis:
00165  *
00166  * Helper function for TranslationEngine::run. 
00167  *
00168  *   Call TranslateCommonControl::validateCommonOptions. The
00169  *   validation for translate engine specific options are handled in the
00170  * common controller. If this ever changes put the specific changes here.
00171  *
00172  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts.
00173  * @param engine  - required for complex validation only.
00174  *
00175  * @return - Throws APT_ERR_ABORT exception on error.
00176  */
00177 /*****************************************************************************/
00178 static void _validateOptions(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine *engine)
00179 {
00180 
00181   TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions(rte, engine);
00182 
00183 }
00184 // end _validateOptions
00185 /*****************************************************************************/
00186 /*****************************************************************************/
00187 /**
00188  * TranslationEngine::_setADTOptions:
00189  * Synopsis:
00190  * Helper function for TranslationEngine::run.
00191  * 
00192  * Call TranslateCommonControl::setADTOptions and then set the translate
00193  * specific ATDOption values.
00194  *
00195  *  We need to set the specific options here so that when command help
00196  * is called the options are not visible.
00197  *
00198  *
00199  * @param adtOpts                 - the ATDOption object to set
00200  * @param messageHandlerCallback  - controller specific callback for setting controller independent options. 
00201  *
00202  */
00203 /*****************************************************************************/
00204 void TranslationEngine::_setADTOptions(ADTOptions & adtOpts,
00205                           void (*messageHandlerCallback)(ADTOptions *adtOpts))
00206 {
00207 
00208   TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions(adtOpts, this);
00209 
00210     // WARNING: The if conditions are deliberately separate and not
00211   // coded as "if/else" pairs in order to afford testing both
00212   // code paths simultaneously. DO NOT make m_controllerMask "if/else".
00213 
00214   // CONSOLE SPECIFIC
00215 
00216   if (m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE) {
00217     adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListVector = getOptVector("experiment-list-vector");
00218 
00219     if (getOptVector("marker-list-vector").size() > 1) {
00220       adtOpts.m_inputProbeSetVector = getOptVector("marker-list-vector");
00221       if (adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDef) {
00222         adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_FIRST;
00223       } else {
00224         adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_DUPLICATE;
00225       }
00226     }
00227 
00228     adtOpts.m_inputSampleTable   = getOptInt("sample-table");
00229 
00230     if (adtOpts.m_inputSampleTable > 0) {
00231       int numSampleRows = adtOpts.m_inputSampleTable;
00232 
00233       for (int row = 0; row < numSampleRows; row++) {
00234         adtOpts.m_sampleTable.push_back(getOptVector("sample-table::" + ToStr(row)));
00235       }
00236     }
00237 
00238 
00239   }
00240 
00241   if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00242       adtOpts.m_prototypeCHPFiles = getOptBool("prototype-chp-files");
00243   }
00244 
00245   return;
00246 
00247 }
00248 // TranslationEngine::_setADTOptions
00249 /*****************************************************************************/
00250 /*****************************************************************************/
00251 /**
00252  * TranslationEngine::run
00253  * Synopsis:
00254  *
00255  *   Common option-less factory interface for running an engine.
00256  *
00257  *  Arguably this method should be broken into the following sections.
00258  *  Then again doing so would require passing 20-30 state variables so
00259  *  maybe not.
00260  *  1.) runInitialize
00261  *  2.) runDoAnalysis
00262  *  3.) runCleanup
00263  *
00264  */
00265 /*****************************************************************************/
00266 void TranslationEngine::runImp()
00267 {
00268 
00269   //runInitialize
00270   
00271   // INPUT DATA: all the single instance classes are allocated here.
00272   // A single instance class may be instantiated from either a file
00273   // or a PgOptions std::vector. In either case the data is stashed in
00274   // a common TSV file model.
00275   MarkerListModel             *mlm  = NULL;
00276   CopyNumberTableModel        *cntm = NULL;
00277   GenotypeTableModel          *gtm  = NULL;
00278   GenotypeOverrideTableModel  *gotm = NULL;
00279   TranslationTableModel       *ttm  = NULL;
00280   SampleInfoTableModel        *sitm = NULL;
00281   TranslationTable            *tt   = NULL;
00282 
00283   std::stringstream                exceptionSStr;
00284   bool                        okToExit = true;
00285   bool                                            okClose = true;
00286   bool                                            reportsClosed = false;
00287   float                       previousCallSecond = 0.0;
00288   std::vector<ExperimentReport *>  report;
00289   std::string                      timeStamp;
00290 
00291   try {
00292 
00293     _setADTOptions(m_rte.m_adtOpts);
00294 
00295     if (m_messageHandlerCallback != NULL) {
00296       (*m_messageHandlerCallback)(m_rte.m_adtOpts);
00297     }
00298 
00299     // COMMAND LINE SPECIFIC
00300     if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00301 
00302       timeStamp =  Util::getTimeStamp();
00303       m_rte.m_programTime.begin();
00304 
00305       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "[" + m_rte.m_programName  + " " + timeStamp + "]  BEGIN ");
00306     }
00307 
00308     _validateOptions(m_rte, this);
00309 
00310     // AUDIT, don't translate. 
00311     if (! m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit.empty()) {
00312       TranslationAudit ta(m_rte);
00313       exit(ta.audit(m_rte));
00314     }
00315 
00316     m_rte.initializeRunTimeEnvironment();
00317 
00318     // Aggregate as many validation problems similar to how a compiler
00319     // attempts to report all problems. Once all validation error messages
00320     // have been written to standard error, thrown the exception. 
00321     if (! TranslationCommonControl::initializeInputFileModels(m_rte, &mlm, &cntm, &gtm, &ttm, &sitm, &gotm))  {
00322       APT_ERR_ABORT("Errors detected initializing input files.");
00323     }
00324 
00325     ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM headerLevel = ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION;
00326     if ( m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE ) {
00327       headerLevel = ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL;
00328     }
00329     
00330     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "For research use only. Not for diagnostic purposes.");
00331     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "Program=" +  m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName);
00332     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "Version=" +  ADT_VERSION);
00333     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "Date=" + Util::getTimeStamp());
00334     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "TranslationFile=" + Fs::basename(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile));
00335     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "MarkerList=" +  Fs::basename(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile));
00336     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "HaplotypeReportOption=" +  m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText);
00337     Verbose::out(headerLevel, "GenotypeOverrideFile=" + Fs::basename(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile));
00338 
00339     if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00340       if (m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.size() > 0) {
00341         std::stringstream msgSStr;
00342         msgSStr << "Input CHP experiment files     count:      " << m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.size();
00343         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, msgSStr.str());
00344       }
00345     }
00346 
00347     // TRANSLATION TABLE: single instance business object that only stores data
00348     // derived from the the single instance data models, including
00349     // the translation table model. Specifically the translation table
00350     // business object stores business objects CallSets of CallElements
00351     // for the translation table in the form of GeneCall business objects. 
00352     tt = new TranslationTable(m_rte, *ttm , *cntm);
00353 
00354     // REPORT: factory, initialize reports in our report factory. 
00355     if (m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_regression > 0) {
00356       report.push_back(new RegressionExperimentReport());
00357     }
00358     if (m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_markerReport) {
00359       report.push_back(new MarkerExperimentReport());
00360     }
00361 
00362     // TRANSLATION REPORT: the three reports for DMET3 of comprehensive,
00363     // summary and uncalled are so similar they are implemented
00364     // as a generice report object simply called TranslationExperimentReport
00365         TranslationExperimentReport *ter = new TranslationExperimentReport(sitm, gotm);
00366     report.push_back(ter);
00367 
00368     // runDoAnalysis
00369     int totalMarkersRead = 0;
00370     int markersRead;
00371     int totalExperiments = m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.size();
00372 
00373     // How to report progress
00374     int progressStatus = 0; // >0 means we have a progress meter, <= 0 no progress meter
00375 
00376     if ((m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) && !(m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE)) {
00377       if (Verbose::getParam().m_Verbosity == ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL) {
00378           progressStatus = 1; //fine resolution progress meter
00379           Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Translating allele calls", 1 , 1, 1);
00380           Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "\n");
00381       } else {
00382           progressStatus = -1; //no progress meter but we still need to handle some internal state info
00383       }
00384     } else if (!(m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) && (m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE)) {
00385       Verbose::progressBegin(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Translating allele calls", totalExperiments , 1, totalExperiments);
00386       progressStatus = 3; // course progress meter
00387     }
00388 
00389     if ((m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) && !(m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE)) {
00390       if (m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_profile) {
00391         m_rte.m_profiles["readNextExperiment"] = new Profile();
00392         m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop1"] = new Profile();
00393         m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop2"] = new Profile();
00394         m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop3"] = new Profile();
00395       }
00396       m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]    = new Profile();
00397       previousCallSecond = m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]->getElapsedSeconds();
00398     }
00399 
00400 
00401     // MAIN LOOP: stream each experiment into memory and output the
00402     // report results. 
00403     while ((markersRead = gtm->getNextExperiment(m_rte, *ttm, tt->m_geneExperimentCopyNumberCall)) > 0) {
00404 
00405       totalMarkersRead += markersRead;
00406 
00407       std::map< std::string, ExperimentResults*> er;
00408 
00409       if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00410         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, gtm->m_experimentName, false);
00411       }
00412 
00413       // Do the dirty deed and get the allele translations.
00414       set< std::string >::iterator itS;
00415 
00416       for (itS = gtm->m_experimentGenes.begin();
00417            itS != gtm->m_experimentGenes.end(); itS++) {
00418 
00419         gtm->m_geneName = *itS;
00420 
00421         if (er.find(gtm->m_experimentName) == er.end()) {
00422           er[gtm->m_experimentName] = new ExperimentResults();
00423           er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_experiment = gtm->m_experimentName;
00424         }
00425 
00426         if(progressStatus == 1 || progressStatus == -1) {
00427           m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]->begin();
00428           if((progressStatus == 1) && 
00429              ((m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]->getElapsedSeconds() - previousCallSecond) > 1)) {
00430             previousCallSecond = m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]->getElapsedSeconds();
00431             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00432           }
00433         }
00434 
00435         er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_geneResults[gtm->m_geneName] = new ExperimentGeneResults(gtm->m_geneName, gtm->m_experimentName, tt->m_geneCopyNumberZeroCallSet[gtm->m_geneName].m_name);
00436 
00437         tt->translateExperimentGene(m_rte, *gtm, *ttm, *cntm, er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_geneResults[gtm->m_geneName]);
00438 
00439         if (gtm->m_rows.size() > 0) {
00440           er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_sample
00441           = gtm->m_rows[0][GT_SAMPLE_INDEX];
00442           er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_experimentGuid = gtm->getCHPGuid();
00443         }
00444 
00445         er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_markerCallCount += er[gtm->m_experimentName]->m_geneResults[gtm->m_geneName]->m_markerCallCount;
00446 
00447         if ((m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) && !(m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE)) {
00448           m_rte.m_profiles["call_loop"]->end();
00449         }
00450 
00451       } // foreach experiment gene, translate
00452 
00453       for (size_t j = 0; j < report.size(); j++) {
00454         if (!(*report[j]).generate(m_rte, *ttm, er)) {
00455           Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Report failed: " + (*report[j]).name());
00456         }
00457       }
00458 
00459       //cerr << gtm->m_experimentName <<  endl;
00460       if (progressStatus == 3) {
00461         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00462       }
00463 
00464       if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00465         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "...input markers read:         " + ToStr(totalMarkersRead) + "(" + ToStr(markersRead) + ")");
00466       }
00467 
00468       std::map< std::string, ExperimentResults*>::iterator it;
00469 
00470       it = er.begin();
00471       for (; it != er.end(); it++) {
00472         it->second->Clear();
00473       }
00474 
00475     } // foreach experiment, translate each gene.
00476 
00477         // runCleanup
00478     if (progressStatus > 0) {
00479       Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00480     }
00481         
00482         std::string alleleFile = ter->getComprehensiveFileName();
00483         for (int j = report.size() - 1; reportsClosed == false && j >= 0 ; j--) {
00484                 okClose = (*report[j]).close(!okToExit) && okClose;
00485                 delete report[j];
00486                 report.erase(report.begin() + j);
00487         }
00488         reportsClosed = true;
00489     
00490     if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00491       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Input experiments read:                    " + ToStr(totalExperiments));
00492       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Input markers read:                        " + ToStr(totalMarkersRead));
00493     }
00494 
00495         // Run the metabolizer genotyping
00496         std::string metabolizerFile = getOpt("metabolizer-file");
00497         if (metabolizerFile.empty() == false)
00498         {
00499                 std::string outputMetabolizerFile = Fs::join(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir, m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputReportPrefix + "_phenotype.rpt");
00500                 MetabolizerPhenotypingEngine mg;
00501                 mg.setOpt("metabolizer-file", metabolizerFile);
00502                 mg.setOpt("allele-file", alleleFile);
00503                 mg.setOpt("output-file", outputMetabolizerFile);
00504                 mg.setOpt("salt", getOpt("salt"));
00505                 mg.setOpt("md5-file", Fs::join(m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir, m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputReportPrefix + "_md5.rpt"));
00506                 mg.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00507                 mg.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00508                 mg.checkOptions();
00509                 mg.run();
00510                 Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Metabolizer file: " + outputMetabolizerFile);
00511         }
00512 
00513   } catch (const Except &  e) {
00514     okToExit = false;
00515     exceptionSStr << "Message is: " << e.what();
00516 
00517   } catch (CalvinException &ce) {
00518     okToExit = false;
00519     exceptionSStr << "Affymetrix Calvin library has thrown an exception. ";
00520     exceptionSStr << "Description: '" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()) + "'";
00521   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00522     okToExit = false;
00523     exceptionSStr << "Exception caught. " "Most problems with this program are memory related. ";
00524     exceptionSStr << "Message is: " << e.what();
00525   } catch (...) {
00526     okToExit = false;
00527     exceptionSStr << "Unknown exception caught (most problems with this program are memory related).";
00528   }
00529 
00530   // !!! WARNING !!!
00531   // Beyond here no calls to Verbose::out or Verbose::warn can be
00532   // made if okToExit is false and C_CMDLINE is false.
00533   // This is because Vebose::out will
00534   // throw an exception in Windows. All messaging beyond this
00535   // point must be conditioned upon okToExit being true
00536   // if C_CMDLINE is false;
00537 
00538   for (int j = report.size() - 1; reportsClosed == false && j >= 0 ; j--) {
00539     okClose = (*report[j]).close(!okToExit) && okClose;
00540     delete report[j];
00541     report.erase(report.begin() + j);
00542   }
00543 
00544   if (!okClose) {
00545     okToExit = false;
00546     exceptionSStr << "Errors occurred in creating final report files.";
00547   }
00548 
00549   if (m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE) {
00550     if (okToExit) {
00551       m_rte.m_programTime.end();
00552 
00553       if (!(m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE)) {
00554         if (m_rte.m_adtOpts.m_profile) {
00555           m_rte.profilesReport(m_rte.m_programTime.getElapsedSeconds());
00556         }
00557         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Elasped time: " +
00558                      m_rte.m_programTime.getElapsedFormatedString() + ".");
00559       }
00560     }
00561     timeStamp = Util::getTimeStamp();
00562     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "[" + m_rte.m_programName  + " " + timeStamp + "]  END ");
00563 
00564   }
00565 
00566 
00567   if (mlm     != NULL)  delete mlm;
00568   if (cntm    != NULL)  delete cntm;
00569   if (gtm     != NULL)  delete gtm;
00570   if (gotm    != NULL)  delete gotm;
00571   if (ttm     != NULL)  delete ttm;
00572   if (sitm    != NULL)  delete sitm;
00573   if (tt      != NULL)  delete tt;
00574 
00575   // Rethrow the exception
00576   if (!okToExit) {
00577     if ((m_controllerMask & C_CMDLINE)) {
00578       if (m_controllerMask & C_CONSOLE) {
00579         APT_ERR_ABORT("");
00580       }
00581       exit(1);
00582     }
00583     APT_ERR_ABORT(exceptionSStr.str());
00584   }
00585 
00586 
00587   return;
00588 }
00589 // end TranslationEngine::run
00590 /*****************************************************************************/
